Szczesny Senang Dengan Hadirnya Buffon Meski Jatah Mainnya Jadi Berkurang
06 Nov 2019, 18:41 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kiper Juventus Wojciech Szczesny mengaku senang bisa bermain lagi bareng Gianluigi Buffon meski hal itu membuat jatah mainnya di skuat Bianconeri berkurang.
Buffon musim lalu hijrah ke Prancis dan memperkuat PSG. Setelah semusim, ia memutuskan untuk balik ke Italia dan gabung Juventus lagi.
Namun kiper berusia 41 tahun itu tak lagi jadi kiper nomor satu Juventus. Posisi itu diserahkan kepada Wojciech Szczesny.
Namun kenyataannya berbeda. Szczesny dan Buffon akhirnya malah dirotasi oleh Maurizio Sarri belakangan ini.
text:
Szczesny was pleased with Buffon's presence even though the ration was reduced
Nov 6 2019, 18:41 by Bola.net
Soccer - Juventus goalkeeper Wojciech Szczesny admitted he was happy to be able to play again with Gianluigi Buffon even though it made his playing quota in the Bianconeri squad reduced.
Buffon last season moved to France and strengthen PSG. After a season, he decided to return to Italy and join Juventus again.
But the 41-year-old goalkeeper is no longer the number one goalkeeper of Juventus. The position was left to Wojciech Szczesny.
But the reality is different. Szczesny and Buffon ended up being rotated by Maurizio Sarri lately.
